mean_en: a nation occupying the whole of the Australian continent; aboriginal tribes are thought to have migrated from southeastern Asia 20,000 years ago; first Europeans were British convicts sent there as a penal colony
word_etyma: Austral南面的 + ia名词后缀：国家  → Australia 澳大利亚
sentence: I want to visit Australia and see some kangaroos!
sentence_trans: 我想去澳大利亚看看袋鼠！
